name: The Game About The Thing 1+2
description:
The greatest gaming series triumphantly returns for 2021!

Experience both The Game About The Thing 1 and The Game About The Thing 2 like never before. New features! Widescreen, sound and improved Gerald physics! Blaze through two epic games. Traverse land, buildings and even dimensions! Fight back evil and find your jam! Many non-canon secrets are out to be discovered and many experiences are out to be replayed! R U up 2 it?
